name.str: Bionic Space Expander CBM Mk. I

description: Nanobots replace large parts of the involuntary muscles with an innovativ, synthetic muscle structure (that's far smaller but equally capable) to expand the available space for bionic implementations.

name.str: Bionic Space Expander CBM Mk. II

description: Parts of the stroma and skeleton get replaced by nanobots with small storage units to significantly increase the space for bionic implementations in all bodyparts.

name.str: Bionic Space Expander CBM Mk. III

description: Within picoseconds mikro teleport systems cut currently unused bionic implants in an uncountable number of pieces, move them to otherwise unusable space (like the fat tissue) and restore now needed implants on that location.

name.str: Bionic Space Expander CBM Mk. IV

description: Through quantum tunneling most of your implants aren't in this universe anymore ... wherever they are: you've got a lot more space for bionic implementations!
You can use this bionic to burn energy dense organic material as fuel (use 'E'), recharging your power level.  Some materials will produce more power than others.
Space inside your chest cavity has been converted into a storage area.  You may carry an extra 2 liters of volume.
This system lets the user visually sense their own scent, making it possible for them to recognize their surroundings even in complete darkness.

Your left arm has been replaced by a heavy-duty fusion blaster!  You may use your energy banks to fire a damaging heat ray.  However, you are unable to use or carry two-handed items, and your strength limits what you can use with your one hand.
While this system is powered, you're able to visually sense your own scent, making it possible for you to recognize your surroundings even in complete darkness.
You can use this bionic to burn energy dense organic material as fuel (use 'E'), recharging your power level.  Some materials will produce more power than others.

Your left arm has been surgically replaced by a heavy-duty fusion blaster!  You may use your energy banks to fire a damaging heat ray.  However, you are unable to use or carry two-handed items, and your strength limits what you can use with your one hand.

Nanobots replace large parts of the involuntary muscles with an innovativ, synthetic muscle structure (that's far smaller but equally capable) to expand the available space for bionic implementations.
Parts of the stroma and skeleton get replaced by nanobots with small storage units to significantly increase the space for bionic implementations in all bodyparts.

Within picoseconds mikro teleport systems cut currently unused bionic implants in an uncountable number of pieces, move them to otherwise unusable space (like the fat tissue) and restore now needed implants on that location.
Through quantum tunneling most of your implants aren't in this universe anymore ... wherever they are: you've got a lot more space for bionic implementations!
Space inside your chest cavity has been surgically converted into a storage area.  You may carry an extra 2 liters of volume.
